nodes.label: let (pda , bump) = Pubkey :: find_program_address (& [b"shared_seed"] , ctx . program_id) ;
let src = ctx . accounts . vault . to_account_info () ;

token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , Transfer { from : src . clone () , to : ctx . accounts . fee_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . authority . to_account_info () }) . with_signer (& [& [b"shared_seed" , & [bump]]]) , fee ,) ? ;
let bal = * * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow () ;
let event = MyEvent { user : ctx . accounts . user . key () , amount } ;
